Continental Europe, Luxembourg","subAdvisor":null,"inceptionDate":"2007-11-09","investmentObjectiveAndStrategy":"The sub-fund aims to provide long-term total return by investing in a portfolio of equities, while promoting ESG characteristics within the meaning of Article 8 of SFDR. The sub-fund aims to do this with a lower carbon intensity and higher environmental, social and governance (“ESG”) rating, calculated respectively as a weighted average of the carbon intensities and ESG ratings of the sub-fund’s investments, than the weighted average of the constituents of the MSCI World (the “Reference Benchmark”). The sub-fund invests in normal market conditions a minimum of 90% of its net assets in accordance with the Lower Carbon Strategy as described below, in equities and equity-equivalent securities of companies which are domiciled in, based in, carry out the larger part of their business activities in, or are listed on a Regulated Market in developed markets.","hsbcCategoryCode":"GB","hsbcCategoryName":"Global Equity - Broad","dividendYield":0,"distributionFrequency":"Annually","riskLvlCde":"3","currency":"USD","expenseRatio":null,"marginRatio":null,"initialCharge":3,"annualManagementFee":1.5,"assetsUnderManagement":178643401,"assetsUnderManagementCurrencyCode":"USD","topPerformersIndicator":null,"topSellProdIndex":"N","investmentRegionCode":"GL","investmentRegionName":"Global","channelRestrictList":["SI_I"],"fundClassCde":"WIC","amcmIndicator":"Y","nextDealDate":"2025-08-13","surveyedFundNetAssetsDate":"2025-08-12","riskFreeRateName":"USTREAS T-Bill Auction Ave 3 Mon","relativeRiskMeasuresIndexName":"Morningstar Global TME NR USD","dayEndBidOfferPricesDate":null,"dayEndNAVDate":"2025-08-12","prodStatCde":"C","allowBuy":"N","allowSell":"Y","allowSwInProdInd":"N","allowSwOutProdInd":"Y","allowSellMipProdInd":"N","annualReportDate":"2025-03-31","piFundInd":null,"deAuthFundInd":null,"weekRangeLowDate":"2025-04-09","weekRangeHighDate":"2024-09-27"}}}
